Recommended Modules

Recommended Modules

  • Dice So Nice: This module for Foundry VTT adds the ability to show a 3D dice simulation when a roll is made.
  • Quick Insert: A powerful tool for finding, controlling and inserting things in Foundry VTT.
  • Year Zero Engine Combat: A module that adds YZE combat mechanics to a game system!
  • Image Z00M: This module adds a button to image windows that allows you to see that image on its real size and zoom them!

Support

Support

We sincerely hope you have a flawless experience with this module, but if you have any issues or bugs, please reach out and we will do our best to get things fixed!

Please, contact us using one of the following contact options:

  • Free League: support@frialigan.se
  • Hod Publishing: support@hodpub.com

Chapter Zero

System / Quickstart Manual

Thanks for downloading this free Quickstart PDF! The Kickstarter for the full Invincible – Superhero Roleplaying game, in print and digital formats, will continue until October 16. Don't miss out!

Welcome to Invincible – Superhero Roleplaying Quickstart for Foundry VTT. This is a WIP (work in progress) development system, which means that a lot of things will change between now and the final release.

But you already have a complete working system that will allow you to play some small adventures in the Invincible world, including The Clone Job, the adventure included on this Quickstart, which is fully reproduced here, prepared with tokens, lights, and some enrichments.

All the Pregens and NPCs are fully created in the Actors tab, and all the text is available in the Journals. Per default, the chapter 1, that contains the basic rules, is shared with all players. The rest is only visible to you, the GM.

Although Foundry has a card implementation, it does not really work as physical cards. Given that, we converted the Social Events cards into Foundry journals. Right click and configure the ownership, giving each player their social events in this @UUID[JournalEntry.CuJpWCTSnfhiMm17]{journal}.

We believe that there is only one character that requires some extra-information: the Monster-Girl. Her stats have two set of values in the PDF: one when she is transformed into Monster, another when she is in her Girl form. The Girl's form stats are inside parenthesis, that does not really work for Foundry. So, we created a macro that will update the values accordingly, and it will consume the resolve in case the transformation is done from the Monster to the Girl form. To allow players to do that, you will need to give them the observer permission to the macro @UUID[Macro.41qKvjN7il0PfZb8]{Monster Girl - Alternate Form}. They will be able to run that clicking on the Talent "Alternate Form".

If you have any question, you can find us on the Foundry VTT server or on the Year Zero Worlds server on discord. Before opening a bug or requesting any feature on the Github project, keep in mind that as this is a Quickstart, we will not be implementing more features until the game is released.

We hope you have fun playing the game!

Cussa Mitre - Hod Publishing
